Sherpao and Nausherwani submitted their requests for their acquittal from the Bugti murder case .

On this the ATC issued notices to the relevant authorities and adjourned the hearing till June 16 .
This is the sixth time that the court has ordered for the former military dictator 's appearance in court , but he has remained absent from all hearings despite assurance provided by his guarantors .
Baloch nationalist leader Akbar Khan Bugti was killed in a cave on Aug 26 , 2006 during a crackdown ordered by Musharraf .
